hero.p: Download FingeRate app now! Take quick surveys, share your thoughts, and start earning amazing rewards! Your opinions matter, and so do the rewards – it's that simple! Let your voice count and your earnings grow!

features: Create an account, take surveys, and get rewards! Say goodbye to waiting and hello to instant gratification!
FingeRate App Screenshot of getting rewarded for survey participation
Collect mileage, snag cool coupons, and deck out your avatar in style! Trade your SoM for amazing rewards and epic accessories - your opinion, your style, your rewards!
FingeRate App Screenshot of My Wallet page, showing amount of SoM points and coupons
Our app prioritizes security and privacy. We have carefully developed it using the latest technology to ensure an unmatched level of protection for your data.
FingeRate App Screenshot of My Profile page
steps: Download the app, create an account, and take you first survey!
Trade SoM for coupons and other benefits directly on the app!
Curious about something? Create your own survey in only a few seconds! It is that simple.

points: Fun and Easy Way to Earn Rewards
Your Avatar, Your Rewards, Your Own World

hero.p1: Everything you need to create actionable insights! FingeRate Bot is an AI-powered contactless survey solution that transforms feedback into meaningful actions.
hero.p2: Crafting a seamless experience for your visitors and collaborators is at the core of our solution! Powered by AI technology, it ensures a secure and effortless experience, eliminating the need for physical contact and cumbersome paper surveys. Instead, it helps you gather real-time data infused with authentic emotions, transforming the way you engage with your audience.

how.survey-item-3: Show your fingers to answer the survey

cards: Our contactless survey solution ensures you receive data precisely when and where you need it! Real-time responses translate to instant actionable insights, simplifying the path to improvement. Because what's simpler for your audience is better for your success.
Person showing gesture to the FingeRate Bot
Explore the dashboard for quick, actionable insights that are easy to understand. Monitor your surveys in real-time and enjoy the added benefits of easy customization of your FingeRate Bot.
Screenshot of FingeRate Dashboard showing graph of visitors and participants in survey

Our platform is built with robust encryption protocols and follows industry best practices to ensure that your information remains confidential. You can trust us to handle your data with the utmost care and protect it from unauthorized access.

contact.h2: Get Started with FingeRate Bot Today!
contact.p: Take your customer feedback strategy to the next level. Contact us now to learn more about FingeRate Bot, request a demo, and discover how our solution can transform your business. Don't miss out on the opportunity to unlock the true potential of your customer interactions.

hero.p: Take full advantage of the FingeRate ecosystem! Download the <0>App</0>, earn rewards, and trade MSOT on Latoken

section-1.p-1: MSOT Token is directly used to navigate the FingeRate Ecosystem. It provides users with various rewards, while creating a world of opportunities.
section-1.p-2: It is built on a secure and transparent blockchain network, ensuring that the best functionalities are available to users while maintaining a high level of security and trust.

section-2.p-1: Are you ready to be a part of something big? Join our vibrant community on X and Telegram (but not only!) and become a driving force behind the success of FingeRate!
section-2.p-2: Stay updated with the latest developments, share your ideas, and connect with like-minded individuals who share your passion for innovation and new technologies!

roadmap.p: Witness the evolution of our ecosystem through game-changing upgrades and tailored functionalities, as we push the boundaries to deliver an unparalleled experience for our users.
2021: Designed the web and Metaverse platform
Mined 1,000 virtual bots and uploaded them on OpenSea MarketPlace
Token Swap from BTour to MSOT
2022: FingeRate app 2.0 development design and planning
Planning for FingeRate Bot advanced version development
2023: Official rebranding of FingeRate from BTour Chain
FingeRate app official launch in South Korea targeting local market
Upgraded version of FingeRate Bot with improved AI and data accuracy
2024: Wallet, block explorer, and dApp functionalities to strengthen the blockchain ecosystem
Development of AI Deep research services For FR Bot
FingeRate app official launch on the global market
FingeRate Bot compatibility with all kinds of kiosks / digital displays
2025: AI capabilities for deep research services
Fully automated generation of reports that analyze survey data

hero.p: Meet the people behind FingeRate and its unique ecosystem!

core.p: We bring a wealth of experience, all sprinkled with passion

history.p-1: Back in 2019, our founders Seung-soo Han and Young-kun Kim noticed that there was a need for solutions that would facilitate data gathering in the tourist sector. After digging deeper and building a passionate team, they discovered the power of AI and created the first FingeRate Bot.
history.p-2: Fast forward three years to the height of the Covid-19 pandemic, the FingeRate team expanded their ecosystem by introducing a groundbreaking app. This innovative metaverse application allows users to participate in surveys and earn rewards.
history.p-3: Today, the FingeRate team is setting its sights on reaching new heights, aiming to provide exceptional services and innovative solutions.

q&a: What are SoM? How does it work?

<0>SoM is the in app mileage which can be used as currency in the app to purchase items from Marketplace, pay for survey registration and eventually convert it to MSOT tokens to withdraw as money.</0><1>1SoM= $0.1</1><2>Earning SoM is very easy.</2><3><4>By entering your additional information (one time)</4><5>By inviting your friends (use your referral code to invite friends)</5><6>By participating in surveys</6><7>Daily attendance check</7><8>Daily survey participation check</8></3><9>NB: Earned SoMs expire in 6 months</9>
How do I get started? / How to Sign up?
<0>Signing up for FingeRate is incredibly easy! You can begin your journey by directly registering on the app using your email, Kakao account, or Naver Account.</0>
What do you do with my survey responses?
<0>With the responses provided by the participants, we analyze it and provide the result to the survey requester. The analyzed result can also be seen from FingeRate app.</0>
Why does is it call Survey to Earn (S2E)?

<0>Survey to Earn (S2E)  allows users to earn rewards by participating in surveys. It provides an opportunity for individuals to share their opinions and insights on various topics and receive compensation in return.</0>
How to earn SoM?

<0>Earning SoM is very easy.</0><1><2>By entering your additional information (one time)</2><3>By inviting your friends (use your referral code to invite friends)</3><4>By participating in surveys</4><5>Daily attendance check</5><6>Daily survey participation check</6></1><7>NB: Earned SoMs expire in 6 months</7>
What can I do with the SoMs I have?

<0>User can use their earned SoMs for the following purposes:</0><1><2>Purchasing avatar accessories from Marketplace</2><3> Purchasing reward/coupons from Marketplace (to be implemented)</3><4>Pay for survey registration</4><5>Swapping SoM with MSOT tokens</5></1><6>NB: 1SoM=$0.1 Earned SoMs expire in 6 months</6>
How do I purchase additional SoM?
<0>Users can purchase SoM using their credit cards from FingeRate app. Please go to 'Wallet' click Recharge and follow the steps.</0>
What can I get by answering your surveys?

<0>Users can earn SoM, an in-app mileage which can be used as currency in the app to purchase items from Marketplace, pay for survey registration and eventually convert it to MSOT tokens to withdraw as money.</0>
Who is behind FingeRate?
<0>GG56 is the driving force behind the development and management of FingeRate and its associated ecosystem. You can read more about the company on the <1>official website</1></0>
Can I create my own survey?

<0>Users can create and manage their own surveys directly from FingeRate app!</0><1><2>On the Survey tab, select the type of survey you want to create</2><3>Choose the number of SoTs and determine the duration of the survey</3><4>Decide on the number of participants you want for your survey. You can set a specific limit or leave it open-ended</4><5>Add your survey questions and pay using SoM!</5></1>
How can I join the community?
<0>Users can follow us on social media, including <1>Instagram</1>, <2>Facebook</2>, <3>X</3>, <4>Telegram</4>, and <5>LinkedIn</5>!</0>
What platform is FingeRate available on?
<0>FingeRate App is available on <1>iOS</1> and <2>Android</2>!</0>
Who can I contact regarding a press inquiry?
<0>For press inquiries regarding FingeRate, users can reach out to us directly at <1>shokun51@gg56.world</1> or by using the <2>contact form</2> available on our website.</0>
How do you handle security?

<0>We have implemented robust measures to ensure the security of your information. We maintain a secure infrastructure with industry-standard security protocols and utilize encryption techniques to safeguard your data during transmission and storage. Our access controls are designed to restrict unauthorized access, and we regularly monitor access logs. Whenever possible, we anonymize and aggregate data to protect individual identities. We are committed to complying with applicable data protection and privacy regulations, such as GDPR, and strive to meet legal requirements for data processing, storage, and sharing.</0><1>For more detailed information about how we handle your data, please refer to our Privacy Policy. It provides comprehensive insights into our data collection, use, and protection practices. Additionally, our Terms of Use outline the terms and conditions governing your use of the FingeRate platform. You can access both the <2>Privacy Policy</2> and <3>Terms of Use</3> on our website.</1><4>For further inquiries or concerns about data protection, please don't hesitate to contact us.</4>

hero.p: Whether you are curious about our solutions or simply want to reach out, this page serves as a portal to connect with FingeRate.

details.h2: Send us message now and get support from the FingeRate team! We will get back to you soon.
